Led. av styr. <i. län. hemb :förb., hälsov :förb. o. fjäder-fäavelsfören., sekr. i landstingets hus-m:sem. nd 44, varit sekr. i län. hus-ni :förb., v. ordf. i Yrkeskvinnors kl., styr :led. i bildn :förb. m. m. Stud :res. m. bidr. av allm. medel t. Finl., Norge, Danm., Tyskl., Holl., Belg., Engl., Frankr., Schweiz, Österr., Ung. o. Tjeckoslov., i USA 47-48. Skr.: art. i tidn. o. tidskr. i fackämnen m. m. LettTSO, JUF ftjt. , Bengt Hugo, läroverksadjunkt, Oskarshamn, f. 3/2/87 i Foilkärna, Kopparb. 1., av krono-länsm. Carl Fredrik W. o. Anna Kristina Enlund. — Mog:ex. i Falun 05, fil. kand. i Upps. 19, fil. mag. 26, genomg. Gbgs hand:inst. 26-27, skidin-str :kurs i Storlien 29, idr :kurser i Sol-l^acka 29 o. 30, provår i Upps. 27. Bankanst. 07-10, vik. adj. i Haparanda 19, Skoghall 20, Karlskr. s. å., Gbgs västra real 21-23, Trollhättan 24-25, Östersund 28-32, adj. i Mönsterås 32, adj. i geogr. o. biol. m. hälsolära v. Oskarshamns samrealsk. 39.
translated: Rut Ester Matilda, home consultant, Linköping, b. 7/7/03 in Helgesta, Södermani. 1st child of Nils W. and Ester Hallgren. — Attended Ateneum for Girls in Stockholm in 19xx, Vocational School for Household Economics in 1925, completed several short courses. Employed at Munka-Ljungby Folk High School in 1927-1928, home consultant at Östergötland County Housewife Association since 1929, appointed principal for vocational schools in East Gothland County in 1947. Member of the board of County Home Economics Association, Health Association, and Poultry Breeding Association, secretary at County Housewife Seminar since 1944, previously secretary of County Housewife Association, vice-president of Professional Women's Club, board member of Portrait Association, and more. Conducted study trips with grants from public funds to Finland, Norway, Denmark, Germany, Holland, Belgium, England, France, Switzerland, Austria, Hungary, Czechoslovakia, and the USA in 1947-1948. Wrote articles in journals and specialist magazines. Married Bengt Hugo, teacher, Oskarshamn, b. 3/2/87 in Folkärna, Kopparb. County, son of Carl Fredrik W. and Anna Kristina Enlund. — Graduated from high school in Falun in 1905, Bachelor of Arts in Uppsala in 1919, Master of Arts in 1926, completed Gothenburg's Handicraft Institute in 1926-1927, skiing course in Storlien in 1929, sports courses in Sollentuna in 1929 and 1930, probationary year in Uppsala in 1927. Worked at a bank from 1907-1910, substitute teacher in Haparanda in 1919, Skoghall in 1920, Karlskrona in the same year, Gothenburg West High School 1921-1923, Trollhättan 1924-1925, Östersund 1928-1932, teacher in Mönsterås in 1932, teacher of geography and biology with health education at Oskarshamn Secondary School since 1939.

publications.name: Articles in Journals and Specialist Magazines
